venue.name: Boston Affilaite Marketing Networking Group @ iBasis in Burlington, MA

item.description:
----- Local Boston Affiliate Webmaster Publishers & Affiliate Marketing Managers Wanted! ------


The Boston Affiliate Marketing Roundtable is a group of Boston affiliate managers and affiliates that meet in a monthly open round table discussion to share tips, strategies and develop long term partnership with in the local Boston affiliate marketing community.

175+ Members and Growing

Average 20+ affiliate marketers attend this Boston affiliate marketing event.

We usually meet the 3rd Thursday of the month at 2:30pm.

However will push this one out an extra Thursday.

Location: Hosted at iBasis / Pingo.com in Burlington, MA with a fridge full of drinks and snacks provided.


Agenda: This Meeting is for Merchant / Affiliate Marketing Manager Topics Only

2:15 to 2:30pm Open Networking

2:30 to 3:30pm Affiliate Marketing Roundtable Discussion.

* 2-3 Min Merchant Intro:

- Share Your Affiliate Program's Product or Service
- Explain you?re (USP) Unique Selling Proposition: How do you stand up to your competing affiliate programs
- Details on your payouts, average order size and conversion rates

What type of online publishers are you looking for? Share who is your target affiliate?

Finally Funny Short Story Time: Today Meeting Theme is Family:

Share an interesting story about your family or in laws.

3:30 to 3:40pm Merchant to Merchant Cross Promotional Strategies.

* Networking for merchant partner referrals that compliment your affiliate program.

3:40 to 4:15pm Affiliate Recruiting

All Attendees MUST bring a list of potential affiliate referrals.

You cant take from the group, unless youre willing to give

What to bring:
List of Your Top 20 General Category Affiliate Partners
List of targeted specific referrals to give to an attending merchant.

* This is why its important to mention your program in the RSVP to be sure to receive and give potential referrals.

OPEN TOPIC

(If Time)

Share Affiliate Incentives & Promotions
Affiliate Manager Newsletter Communication Tips


4:15 to 4:30pm Flexible one on one time to set up individual networking opportunities with affiliate managers.

* Each attendee will be given a slot of time to share tips and find support from fellow members.
* The group also provides a monthly team check up of support to your monthly tasks and goals

Some attendees may want to arrange one on ones to meet up for lunch prior or coffee after or just go shopping at the Burlington Mall!

Contact Group organization

Brian Hawkins
Affiliate Marketing Manager
Pingo Phone Card Affiliate Program
Phone Card Marketing Tips
affiliate /at/ pingo.com
781-505-7865

p.s. dont worry, will get you all out before traffic piles up on 95, so that you can get home early as an extra perk for attending.

DONT FORGET TO POST A LINK WITH YOUR RSVP TO YOUR AFFILITE PROGRAM

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: New England To Boston Affiliate Marketing Networking group
